pacman.gameobjects

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.gameobjects.Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blinky, Clyde, Pinky

    public class Ghost
extends Object
implements GameObject
    The parent class of all ghosts that contains the needed methods for the ghosts' functions. e.g. getting the ghosts direction with a* -search algorithm.
    Author:
    eerop

      • setDirectionAStar

        protected void setDirectionAStar(int searchX,
                                 int searchY,
                                 boolean runAway)
        Uses A*-algorithm to find the best route to the destination of the ghost and sets the Direction.
        Parameters:
        searchX - x-coordinate of the destination.
        searchY - y-coordinate of the destination.
        runAway - false, if goal is to get to the target and true if goal is to get away from it.

      • getBounds

        Description copied from interface: GameObject

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(PacMan pacman)
        Description copied from interface: GameObject
        Checs if this object hits the PacMan.
        Specified by:
        checkCollision in interface GameObject
        Parameters:
        pacman - reference to current levels pacman
        Returns:
        true if pacman hits this object, else false.

      • setGraph

        public void setGraph(int[][] graph)

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Used to stop the movement of ghost and change it position so that it doesn't get stuck in a wall.

      • eatPowerpellet

        public void eatPowerpellet(long ln)
        Changes the ppEaten value of this ghost that makes it eatable for pacman. Also slows the ghosts movementand sets the timers value.
        Parameters:
        ln - current time

      • eatableTimer

        public void eatableTimer(long now)
        checks how long the ghost has been in eatale state. If the time has expired it returns it to the normal state.
        Parameters:
        now - current time

      • timeLeft

        public long timeLeft()
        Used to know how long the ghost has been eatable.
        Returns:
        the time that the ghost has been eatable

        moves the ghost to it's starting position.

      • setImages

        public void setImages(BufferedImage img,
                      BufferedImage ppImg)
        Sets the images for a ghost.
        Parameters:
        img - image of the ghost in normal state
        ppImg - image of the ghost in eatable state

      • setImageObserver

        public void setImageObserver(LevelRunner lr)
        Sets the imageObserver that is used to draw the ghost.
        Parameters:
        lr - Imageobserver that's class is LevelRunner
